author: USA TODAY, Jessica Flores, USA TODAY
title: You're not 'too busy' to stay active during coronavirus quarantine: Health experts worry about blood clots, weight gain and more
description: Researchers have continuously found that sitting for long periods is bad for your health, increasing the risk of heart disease, diabetes and more.
content:
The coronavirus outbreak forced people to come up with creative workouts while staying at home.
USA TODAY
As more U.S. states issue stay-at-home orders to combat the spread of coronavirus, many people are working from home and spending long hours streaming … [+3557 chars]
